definitions: the action of assigning to an inferior rank or position

examples.text: the relegation of experienced party members to the status of second-class citizens

shortDefinitions: action of assigning inferior rank or position

definitions: the transfer of a sports team or player to a lower division of a league

examples.text: the team manager refuses to throw in the towel and admit that relegation is inevitable
the club has suffered two successive relegations

shortDefinitions: transfer of sports team to lower division of league
